info.title: social-api
info.description: API used for MIXIT to retrieve information about the users, content, etc

get.summary: Returns a list of Posts created by the user, specified by the requested UID.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UID of the user in mixit platform

parameters.name: next_token
parameters.description: The fields can contain the next_token if to get the next "set" of posts.

get.summary: Returns the home timeline for a user specified by the requested UUID.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UID of the user in mixit platform

parameters.name: next_token
parameters.description: The fields can contain the next_token if to get the next "set" of posts.

get.summary: Returns detailed information about a post using it's ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the post

get.summary: Returns a list of replie tweets, specified by the requested UID. This will only work for recent tweets.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the post

parameters.name: next_token
parameters.description: The fields can contain the next_token if to get the next "set" of posts.

get.summary: Returns a list of users that have liked the Post specified by the requested UID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the post

parameters.name: next_token
parameters.description: The fields can contain the next_token if to get the next "set" of users.

get.summary: Returns a variety of information about a single user specified by the requested UUID.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UID of the user in mixit platform

parameters.name: user.fields
parameters.description: The fields can be location, created_at, public_metrics, and must be separated by commas. Make sure to not include a space between commas and fields.

post.summary: Adds a new user in the platform based on the UUID provided.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UID of the user in mixit platform.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name displayed in the user's profile in mixit platform.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username/handler of the user in mixit platform.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location selected by the user in mixit platform.

parameters.name: twitter_id
parameters.description: The twitter id of the user associated with the mixit profile.

put.summary: Updates the information of the user added to the platform.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UID of the user in mixit platform.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name displayed in the user's profile in mixit platform.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username/handler of the user in mixit platform.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location selected by the user in mixit platform.

delete.summary: Removes an user from the platform based on the UUID provided.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UID of the user in mixit platform

message.description: A message indicating the success of the operation.

get.summary: Returns a variety of information about a single user specified by the requested username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user in mixit platform

parameters.name: user.fields
parameters.description: The fields can be location, created_at, public_metrics, and must be separated by commas. Make sure to not include a space between commas and fields.

get.summary: Returns a list of users who are followers of the specified UUID (Twitter ID).

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UID of the user in mixit platform

parameters.name: next_token
parameters.description: A value that encodes the next 'page' of results that can be requested.

200.description: A list of users who are followers.

get.summary: Returns a list of users that the specified UUID (Twitter ID) follows.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the user in mixit platform

parameters.name: next_token
parameters.description: A value that encodes the next 'page' of results that can be requested.

200.description: A list of users who are followers.

uuid.description: Unique identifier of this user. This is returned as a string in order to avoid complications with languages and tools that cannot handle large integers.

name.description: Name displayed on user's profile in mixit

username.description: The mixit handler of this user which is also unique.

created_at.description: Creation time of this account. To return this field, add user.fields=created_at in the request's query parameter.

location.description: The location specified in the user's registration. As this is a user input, it may not indicate a valid location. To return this field, add user.fields=location in the request's query parameter.

public_metrics.description: Contains details about activity for this user. To return this field, add user.fields=public_metrics in the request's query parameter.

followers_count.description: Number of users who follow this user.

following_count.description: Number of users this user is following.

external_information.description: Contains details the user's identification on other platforms. To return this field, add user.fields=external_information in the request's query parameter.

id.description: The ID of the user on twitter.

twitter_name.description: The friendly name of this user, as shown on their profile.

twitter_username.description: The Twitter handle (screen name) of this user.
